page.title: 08LYNEHAM SHOPS
page.content: THE COMMUNITY IS WELL SERVED FOR SHOPS. THERE IS A SUPERMARKET, THE NAFFI, SELLING EVERYTHING FROM FOOD TO T.V. SETS. THERE IS ALSO A BUTCHER'S SHOP, A PAPER SHOP, A MINI-MARKET, A FRUIT AND VEGETABLE SHOP, A BANK, A BICYCLE/DO IT YOURSELF SHOP,A NEWSAGENT, A FISH AND CHIP SHOP,A BUILDING SOCIETY, A VIDEO SHOP AND AN ESTATE AGENT. THERE IS ALSO A DRY CLEANERS, A POST OFFICE AND A HAIRDRESSING SALON FOR BOTH MALE AND FEMALE. I WENT TO MR POTTER'S SHOP AND I BROUGHT SOME MEAT. I WENT TO THE FISH AND CHIP SHOP WITH MY DADDY GARETH RAYBOULD 6YRS. I HAVE BEEN TO A NEWSPAPER SHOP CALLED "MALLOW'S"AND TO ANOTHER SHOP A MINI-MARKET MY DADDY GOES TO THE BANK AT DINNER _TIME REBBECA SIBUN 6YRS.
